title: Visual Studio Code
description: Free, open-source code editor with intelligent code completion, built-in Git integration, extensive extension marketplace, and powerful debugging capabilities for modern development workflows.

keyFeatures.title: IntelliSense Code Completion
keyFeatures.description: Smart code completion with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and intelligent suggestions based on variable types and function definitions.

keyFeatures.title: Extensive Extension Marketplace
keyFeatures.description: Thousands of extensions for languages, themes, debuggers, and tools to customize and enhance your coding experience.

keyFeatures.title: Built-in Git Integration
keyFeatures.description: Native Git support with visual diff editor, staging, branching, and seamless version control workflow.

keyFeatures.title: Powerful Debugging Tools
keyFeatures.description: Advanced debugging capabilities with breakpoints, call stacks, variable inspection, and multi-language debugging support.

keyFeatures.title: Integrated Terminal
keyFeatures.description: Built-in terminal that supports multiple shells and allows you to run commands without leaving the editor.

keyFeatures.title: Live Share Collaboration
keyFeatures.description: Real-time collaborative editing and debugging sessions with other developers, including shared terminals and servers.

keyFeatures.title: Remote Development
keyFeatures.description: Develop on remote machines, containers, or WSL with the same local VS Code experience through remote extensions.

useCases: Data science and machine learning projects

title: Figma
description: Collaborative interface design tool with real-time collaboration, prototyping, and design system capabilities.

title: GitHub
description: Comprehensive platform for Git-based version control, collaborative development, automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions, and AI-powered coding assistance with GitHub Copilot.

keyFeatures.title: Git Version Control
keyFeatures.description: Complete Git-based version control system for tracking changes, managing branches, and collaborative development.

keyFeatures.title: GitHub Actions CI/CD
keyFeatures.description: Powerful automation platform for building, testing, and deploying code with custom workflows and pre-built actions.

keyFeatures.title: GitHub Copilot
keyFeatures.description: AI-powered coding assistant that provides intelligent code suggestions, auto-completion, and code generation.

keyFeatures.title: Code Review & Collaboration
keyFeatures.description: Built-in tools for code reviews, pull requests, issue tracking, and team collaboration.

keyFeatures.title: Repository Management
keyFeatures.description: Organize code with repositories, manage access permissions, and integrate with third-party tools.

keyFeatures.title: Open Source Community
keyFeatures.description: World's largest platform for open source projects with millions of repositories and developers.

useCases: Version control and source code management

title: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace combining notes, tasks, wikis, and databases for personal and team productivity.

title: Tailwind CSS
description: Utility-first CSS framework with low-level utility classes for building custom designs without writing CSS.

title: Coursera
description: Online learning platform offering courses, specializations, and degrees from top universities and companies.

title: Postman
description: API development platform for building, testing, and documenting APIs with collaborative features.

title: Canva
description: User-friendly graphic design platform with templates, stock photos, and design tools for non-designers.

title: Stack Overflow
description: Question and answer community for programmers to share knowledge and solve coding problems.

title: Slack
description: Business communication platform with channels, direct messaging, file sharing, and app integrations.
